item.description:
Hi All members of The Boston Drum Circle Meetup:

As Summer is almost here, we are moving the Drum Circle to our outdoor location on the Charles River! - If you've never joined us for one of these outdoor Drum Circles, this is you chance to experience something magical! Playing along the River, having dancers, BBQ's - its a party in the making! And we move to Sat. Afternoons to make the party last!

Our next Drum Circle Meetup is Sat. July 31th from 2-4pm at the Charles River (either Parking lot #1 or at the Public Theatre - depending on parking availability) If we do BBQ, we go to 6PM.

Hope to see you all there!

Yours in Drumming Spirt,

Alan, Fanta, and Stu
About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: We will let you know exactly were we will be that Sat.
item.name: The Boston Drum Circle - Back Outside at the Charles River!
